paper_title.en: Characteristics of the magnetic gear using a bulk high-Tc superconductor

description.en:
A magnetic gear which can transmit force without contact has operational benefits of requiring neither vibration, noise, nor lubrication. Still, its transmission force is considerably smaller than a mechanical gear. Strong magnets are needed to improve magnetic gear transmission force. For this purpose, a magnet formed by the pinning effect in a bulk superconductor might have magnetic flux density several times stronger than rare-earth permanent magnets.
We propose a noncontact magnetic gear using a bulk high-Tc superconductor. In this paper, a three-dimensional electromagnetic field analysis program has been developed to analyze characteristics of the proposed gear. Two superconducting magnetic gears with different magnet configuration are manufactured, and their characteristics are measured. The analysis and the experiment explore the possibility of a magnetic gear using the pinning magnet formed in the superconductor.

paper_title.ja: 無限剛性静圧気体軸受の研究(第2報) -無限剛性円板形スラスト軸受の静特性- 「(共著)」
paper_title.en: Study on Externally Pressurized Gas Bearings with Infinite Stiffness (2nd Report) : Experiments on the Static Characteristics of a Circular Thrust Bearing

description.ja: A new type of externally pressurized infinite stiffness gas bearing is proposed. This bearing is constructed with a movable bush, a spring plate and two restrictors in series. The configuration of the bearing, working principle and the analysis of the static characteristics are presented in the previous paper. This paper describes the construction of a circular thrust bearing and experimental results of the static characteristics. Experimental results show a good agreement with the analytical values and it is proved that the bearing has infinite stiffness.
description.en: A new type of externally pressurized infinite stiffness gas bearing is proposed. This bearing is constructed with a movable bush, a spring plate and two restrictors in series. The configuration of the bearing, working principle and the analysis of the static characteristics are presented in the previous paper. This paper describes the construction of a circular thrust bearing and experimental results of the static characteristics. Experimental results show a good agreement with the analytical values and it is proved that the bearing has infinite stiffness.

paper_title.ja: 無限剛性静圧気体軸受の研究(第1報) -無限剛性円板形スラスト軸受の性能解析- (共著)
paper_title.en: Study on Externally Pressurized Gas Bearings with Infinite Stiffness (1st Report) : Analysis of the Static Characteristics of Circular Thrust Bearings

description.ja: A new type of externally pressurized infinite stiffness gas bearing is proposed. This bearing is constructed with a movable bush, a spring plate and two restrictors in series. This paper describes the bearing construction applying to a circular thrust bearing, working principle and analysis of the bearing performance. Calculated results show that the bearing has infinite stiffness in the neighbouring region of designed load. This is caused by the fact that the spring stiffness is linear but the change of bearing pressure is not linear to the shaft displacement.
description.en: A new type of externally pressurized infinite stiffness gas bearing is proposed. This bearing is constructed with a movable bush, a spring plate and two restrictors in series. This paper describes the bearing construction applying to a circular thrust bearing, working principle and analysis of the bearing performance. Calculated results show that the bearing has infinite stiffness in the neighbouring region of designed load. This is caused by the fact that the spring stiffness is linear but the change of bearing pressure is not linear to the shaft displacement.

paper_title.ja: ヘリウム冷凍機への再生圧縮機の応用(第2報) 共著
paper_title.en: Application of Regenerative Compressors to Helium Refrigerators - Compression Characteristics of a Trial Compressor.:Compression Characteristics of a Trial Compressor

description.ja: A regenerative compressor equipped with 5-axis controlled magnetic bearings is manufactured on an experimental basis. Compression characteristics of the compressor are measured for air and helium of room temperature. Pressure coefficients are very large in comparison with that of centrifugal compressors and ranged 3.5-4.8 for air and 3.6-6.4 for helium. High pressure ratio can be obtained with a single stage regenerative compressor. Surging phenomena were not observed over a full range of flow rate. The efficiency of the trial compressor is very low and its maximum value is only about 6%. It is required to improve the efficiency. Escape flow from outlet to inlet port through a separator is comparable to the effective flow rate. This is thought to be one of factors that lower the efficiency. From the view of its compression characteristics, regenerative compressors are thought to be the best for stabilizing or controlling device of oil-free helium refrigerators equipped with multi-stage centrifugal compressors when their efficiency is improved.
description.en: A regenerative compressor equipped with 5-axis controlled magnetic bearings is manufactured on an experimental basis. Compression characteristics of the compressor are measured for air and helium of room temperature. Pressure coefficients are very large in comparison with that of centrifugal compressors and ranged 3.5-4.8 for air and 3.6-6.4 for helium. High pressure ratio can be obtained with a single stage regenerative compressor. Surging phenomena were not observed over a full range of flow rate. The efficiency of the trial compressor is very low and its maximum value is only about 6%. It is required to improve the efficiency. Escape flow from outlet to inlet port through a separator is comparable to the effective flow rate. This is thought to be one of factors that lower the efficiency. From the view of its compression characteristics, regenerative compressors are thought to be the best for stabilizing or controlling device of oil-free helium refrigerators equipped with multi-stage centrifugal compressors when their efficiency is improved.
